body.p: Which of the following best describes the role of an IP address?

multiple_choice.choice: Identify priority packets to be sent immediately.
Identify a computer on a network so it can send and receive packets.
Identify each byte in RAM for use by the CPU.

response.feedback: IP addresses identify something other than priority.
IP addresses identify something other than encryption.
IP addresses identify a computer on the internet.
IP addresses identify something other than bytes in RAM.
